text: This one is fashioned in multicam, a commercial camouflage similar to the OCP used by the U.S. Armed Forces.
This one is decorated with the black multicam pattern, for that stealth feeling.
This one is decorated with the desert multicam pattern, for when you suddenly find yourself in Nevada.
This one is decorated with the tropic multicam pattern, perfect for that steamy, sweaty jungle warfare.
This one is decorated with the white multicam pattern, for when your target is the at top of Everest.
This one is covered with the woodland pattern.
This one is decorated with the OCP pattern, the camouflage employed by multiple branches of the U.S. Armed Force.
This one is decorated with the pixelated UCP pattern, the camouflage previously used by multiple branches of the U.S. Armed Force.
This one is decorated with the A-TACS FG camouflage, a woods pattern consisting of shades of green and black.
